Author: Rivka90
Text: I haven't owned a scale in a few years because I KNOW what it does to me, but just this week I went and bought another one. Self care fail.

Author: nosleeptill8
Text: I got rid of mine at home, same reason, and now compulsively weigh myself at the gym and my sport club. Before and after class, with a photo of the scale to save in a folder in my phone. I think my coach knows something isnâ€™t right.
